name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】1 day 4 colors【#ホロ4期生ライブ2025】 [H8A2CZiyc_E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performing 'Kakushinteki Metamarufōze!' on stage.
Himemori Luna performing 'Yuzurenai Negai' on stage.

subtitles.original: 声も癒せる愛嬌マシマシ
subtitles.english: With an extra dose of voice-soothing charm

subtitles.original: さあ 限界突破 甘いもん食いたいじゃん
subtitles.english: Come on, break the limits, don't you want to eat something sweet?

subtitles.original: 宴の始まりだー！
subtitles.english: Let the feast begin!

subtitles.original: いよいよ いよいよ 行っちゃおうか！
subtitles.english: Finally, finally, let's go for it!

subtitles.original: 甘えで初心な女の子
subtitles.english: Spoiled and innocent girl...

subtitles.original: 演じてみても
subtitles.english: ...even if I try to act like one,

subtitles.original: お兄ちゃんだけは騙せない
subtitles.english: I can't fool you, Onii-chan.

subtitles.original: 嫌われたくないもん
subtitles.english: Because I don't want you to hate me.

subtitles.original: 素直に言えない「ありがとう」
subtitles.english: The 'thank you' I can't say honestly,

subtitles.original: 態度で示そう
subtitles.english: I'll show it through my attitude.

subtitles.original: さあ 限界突破 甘いもん食いたいじゃん
subtitles.english: Come on, break the limits, I want to eat something sweet!

subtitles.original: お兄ちゃんなんて知らない
subtitles.english: I don't care about Onii-chan!

subtitles.original: なーんつって
subtitles.english: Just kidding!

subtitles.original: 一心同体 二人でひとつ
subtitles.english: Two bodies, one soul, two as one,

subtitles.original: それが兄弟でしょ
subtitles.english: that's what siblings are, right?

subtitles.original: 一蓮托生 二人きりの
subtitles.english: Sharing the same fate, just the two of us,

subtitles.original: 運命共同体
subtitles.english: a shared destiny.

subtitles.original: 自由奔放 笑い飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Free-spirited, laugh it all off,

subtitles.original: もっともっと 楽しんだもん勝ち
subtitles.english: more and more, the one who enjoys it wins!

subtitles.original: 天真爛漫 スマイルで
subtitles.english: With an innocent smile,

subtitles.original: ギュッギュッと心を掴んじゃうの
subtitles.english: I'll grab your heart tight!

subtitles.original: やりたい放題は
subtitles.english: Doing whatever I want is

subtitles.original: 信頼の裏返し
subtitles.english: proof of our trust.

subtitles.original: U.M.R! U.M.R!
subtitles.english: U.M.R! U.M.R!

subtitles.original: UMAじゃないよ うまる！
subtitles.english: It's not UMA, it's Umaru!

subtitles.original: U.M.R! U.M.R!
subtitles.english: U.M.R! U.M.R!

subtitles.original: UMAじゃないよ うまる！ Yeah!
subtitles.english: It's not UMA, it's Umaru! Yeah!

subtitles.original: はい おしまい！
subtitles.english: Okay, that's all!

subtitles.original: 止まらない未来を目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for a future that won't stop,

subtitles.original: ゆずれない願いを抱きしめて
subtitles.english: holding tight to an unyielding wish.

subtitles.original:
ゆずれない願い
作詞：田村直美　作曲：田村直美／石川寛門
subtitles.english:
Yuzurenai Negai
Lyrics: Naomi Tamura Composition: Naomi Tamura / Hiroto Ishikawa

subtitles.original: 海の色が赤く染まってゆく
subtitles.english: The color of the sea is being dyed red,

subtitles.original: 無重力状態
subtitles.english: a state of zero gravity.

subtitles.original: このまま風にさらわれたい
subtitles.english: I want to be swept away by the wind just like this.

subtitles.original: いつも飛べないハードルを
subtitles.english: The hurdles I could never fly over,

subtitles.original: 負けない気持ちでクリアしてきたけど
subtitles.english: I've cleared them with a spirit that won't lose, but...

subtitles.original: 出し切れない実力は
subtitles.english: The ability I can't quite bring out fully,

subtitles.original: 誰のせい？
subtitles.english: whose fault is it?

subtitles.original: 止まらない未来を目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for a future that won't stop,

subtitles.original: ゆずれない願いを抱きしめて
subtitles.english: holding tight to an unyielding wish.

subtitles.original: 色あせない心の地図
subtitles.english: A map of the heart that won't fade,

subtitles.original: 光にかざそう
subtitles.english: I'll hold it up to the light.

subtitles.original: どれだけ泣けば朝に出会えるの
subtitles.english: How much must I cry before I meet the morning?

subtitles.original: 孤独な夜
subtitles.english: In the lonely night,

subtitles.original: 初めて限界を感じた日
subtitles.english: the day I felt my limits for the first time.

subtitles.original: きっと恋に落ちるのは
subtitles.english: Falling in love must be

subtitles.original: まばたきみたいな一瞬の情熱だけど
subtitles.english: an instantaneous passion, like a blink, but...

subtitles.original: 愛し続く坂道で
subtitles.english: on the slope of continuing love,

subtitles.original: 強さ覚えたい
subtitles.english: I want to learn strength.

subtitles.original: 止まらない未来を夢見て
subtitles.english: Dreaming of a future that won't stop,

subtitles.original: 口を閉じ瞳を輝かせてきたけれど
subtitles.english: I've kept my mouth shut and eyes shining, but...

subtitles.original: もっと大きな優しさが見えた
subtitles.english: I saw an even greater kindness.

subtitles.original:
飛べないハードルを
負けない気持ちでクリアしてきたけど
subtitles.english:
The hurdles I couldn't fly over,
I've cleared them with a spirit that won't lose, but...

subtitles.original: スタートラインに立つたびに 怯えていた
subtitles.english: Every time I stood at the start line, I was frightened.

subtitles.original: 止まらない未来を描いて
subtitles.english: Painting a future that won't stop,

subtitles.original: 腕を伸ばし
subtitles.english: stretching out my arms.
